title: BILL: LEF-1768645371 - Emergency Data Consumption Reduction and Revenue Generation Initiative

reasoning.problem: BILL: LEF-1768645371. Title: Emergency Data Consumption Reduction and Revenue Generation Initiative. Description: Implement immediate measures to reduce the volume and cost of deep dive reports. Prioritize reports with clear pathways to actionable trading strategies and revenue generation. Explore options for monetizing existing research, including selling anonymized data or insights to external parties. Conduct a comprehensive cost-benefit analysis of current deep dive report subscriptions and terminate underperforming services. This is crucial to stabilize cash reserves and ensure system survival.

technical_spec.description: To be defined by the House of Builders.
